required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Optimization for Laryngeal Mask Removal Strategy and Evaluation of Transitional Criteria From PACU in Children
clinical_study.official_title: Optimization for Laryngeal Mask Removal Strategy and Evaluation of Transitional Criteria From PACU in Children

lead_sponsor.agency: Eye & ENT Hospital of Fudan University

clinical_study.source: Eye & ENT Hospital of Fudan University

brief_summary.textblock: Laryngeal mask airway(LMA) is now a widely accepted airway device in general anesthesia for children. LMA removal after operation is always practiced in post-anesthesia-care-unit(PACU). The removal timing depends on recovery of spontaneous respiration and wash-out of inhalation anesthetics. This study focuses on the optimization for LMA removal strategy. Moreover, this study also discusses the transitional criteria from PACU to the ward.

detailed_description.textblock: The study recruits 180 children aged under 6-year-old undergoing elective general anesthesia. Laryngeal mask is used in procedure. The children are carried into PACU to get monitored and removal the LMA. The children are randomized into 4 groups.

primary_outcome.time_frame: before induction
immediately after induction
in procedure

primary_outcome.measure: heart rate when transited into PACU
primary_outcome.time_frame: immediately after transited into PACU (first measured data in PACU)

primary_outcome.measure: heart rate when transited out PACU
primary_outcome.time_frame: before transited out of PACU (last measured data in PACU)
immediately after recovering spontaneous respiratory
primary_outcome.description: heart rate when spontaneous respiratory recovers

primary_outcome.time_frame: immediately after effective spontaneous respiratory recovers
primary_outcome.description: heart rate when effective spontaneous respiratory recovers

primary_outcome.time_frame: immediately after LMA removed
before induction
immediately after induction
in procedure

primary_outcome.measure: mean blood pressure when transited into PACU
primary_outcome.time_frame: immediately after transited into PACU (first measured data in PACU)

primary_outcome.measure: mean blood pressure when transited out PACU
primary_outcome.time_frame: before transited out of PACU (last measured data in PACU)
immediately after recovering spontaneous respiratory
primary_outcome.description: mean blood pressure when spontaneous respiratory recovers

primary_outcome.time_frame: immediately after effective spontaneous respiratory recovers
primary_outcome.description: mean blood pressure when effective spontaneous respiratory recovers

primary_outcome.time_frame: immediately after LMA removed
primary_outcome.description: mean blood pressure when effective spontaneous respiratory recovers

primary_outcome.time_frame: from the time point of the child be transited into PACU until the time point of the LMA be removed
primary_outcome.description: time length from the child transited into PACU to LMA removal

primary_outcome.time_frame: from the time point of the child be transited into PACU until the time point of the child be transited out of PACU
primary_outcome.description: time length of the child staying in PACU

primary_outcome.time_frame: from the time point of the LMA be removed until the time point of the child be transited out of PACU
from the time point of the LMA be removed until the time point of the child be transited out of PACU
from the time point of the LMA be removed until the time point of the child be transited out of PACU
from the time point of the LMA be removed until the time point of the child be transited out of PACU
primary_outcome.description: gross body movement during LMA removal

primary_outcome.time_frame: from the time point of the LMA be removed until the time point of the child be transited out of PACU
from the time point of the LMA be removed until the time point of the child be transited out of PACU

secondary_outcome.description: questionnaire scored from 1-5 to assess the parents' satisfaction : score 1 for worst satisfied, score 5 for best satisfied
questionnaire scored from 1-5 to assess the children's sleep quality : score 1 for worst sleep quality, score 5 for best sleep quality
FLACC scale scored from 0-10 to assess the children's pain after surgery: score 0 for no pain, score 10 for worst pain
questionnaire scored from 1-5 to assess the parents' anxiety : score 1 for no anxiety, score 5 for worst anxiety

arm_group.description: LMA removal be conducted when the child's spontaneous respiratory recovers with body movement spontaneously, and the child be transited from PACU when Aldrete score reaches 9
LMA removal be conducted when the child's spontaneous respiratory recovers with body movement spontaneously, and the child be transited from PACU when Aldrete score reaches 7
LMA removal be conducted when the child's spontaneous respiratory recovers but with no body movement, and the child be transited from PACU when Aldrete score reaches 9
LMA removal be conducted when the child's spontaneous respiratory recovers but with no body movement, and the child be transited from PACU when Aldrete score reaches 7

intervention.description: the timing when conducting LMA removal

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Children aged under 6 years old undergoing selected eye surgery
- Scheduled for general anesthesia
Exclusion Criteria:
- With systemic disease
- Respiratory system deformity
- Respiratory infection in 4 weeks

overall_official.affiliation: Eye and ENT Hospital of Fudan University

facility.name: Eye and EENT hospital of Fudan University

clinical_study.keyword: evaluation of transitional criteria from PACU
